listitem.para: Sets the pen's position, mode, and hardware-dependent characteristics according to the information in the characteristics input. The characteristics input is a list with the following members: [PENDOWNP PENMODE PENSIZE PENCOLOR PENPAINT]. The format of this list may change in futures version of &PRODUCTNAME;, as additional pen characteristics are added. To guarantee portability, the input should be taken from an earlier invocation of PEN.

programlisting.userinput:
CLEARSCREEN REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] MAKE "savepen PEN
CLEARSCREEN SETPENSIZE [20 20] REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90] SETPEN :savepen
CLEARSCREEN REPEAT 4 [FORWARD 100 RIGHT 90]
